CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 13 In addition , it was found that , compared with linear - fused NDT units , the copolymer incorporating the angular - fused NDT units can pack into higher ordered structures , thereby achieving higher OFET mobilities.

Let's think step by step.

1. "linear - fused NDT units"
2. "copolymer incorporating the angular - fused NDT units"

These are the material names in the given paragraph. They are types of polymers with specific structures, denoted by the abbreviation "NDT" and modified by the terms "linear - fused" and "angular - fused".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. "linear - fused NDT units"
2. "copolymer incorporating the angular - fused NDT units"

These are the relevant material names in the given paragraph. The other terms, such as "higher ordered structures" and "higher OFET mobilities" are not material names, but rather describe the properties or characteristics of the materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| linear - fused NDT units |
| copolymer incorporating the angular - fused NDT units |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 13 In addition , it was found that , compared with linear - fused NDT units , the copolymer incorporating the angular - fused NDT units can pack into higher ordered structures , thereby achieving higher OFET mobilities.

Let's think step by step.

1. Higher ordered structures
2. Higher OFET mobilities

These are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph. These entities represent the properties or characteristics that are being compared between two types of materials (linear-fused NDT units and copolymer incorporating angular-fused NDT units). The first entity, "higher ordered structures," refers to the ability of the copolymer to form more complex and organized structures compared to the linear-fused NDT units. The second entity, "higher OFET mobilities," refers to the greater efficiency of charge transport in the copolymer, leading to higher performance in organic field-effect transistors (OFETs).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Higher ordered structures
2. Higher OFET mobilities

These are the entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property in the given paragraph. The other entities, such as "it was found that" and "compared with linear-fused NDT units," are not relevant to the Value of Material Property and have been removed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| higher ordered structures |
| higher OFET mobilities |
